tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE public_transportation_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    route_id INT,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE public_transportation_users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    route_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES public_transportation_routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_location VARCHAR(50),
    end_location VARCHAR(50),
    distance_km FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Trips (
    trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    route_id INT,
    trip_date DATE,
    trip_duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE transportation_usage (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  date DATE,
  primary key (usage_id),
  foreign key (route_id) references public_transportation_routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ticket_information (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  fare DECIMAL,
  purchase_date DATE,
  foreign key (user_id) references users(user_id),
  foreign key (route_id) references public_transportation_routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE routes (route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  starting_point VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  ending_point VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE passengers (passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE trips (trip_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  stop_id INT,
  passenger_id INT,
  date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  distance FLOAT NOT NULL,
  cost DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (stop_id) REFERENCES stops(stop_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (passenger_id) REFERENCES passengers(passenger_id);

CREATE TABLE schedules (schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  day_of_week VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  departure_time TIME NOT NULL,
  arrival_time TIME NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id);

CREATE TABLE fare (fare_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  distance_range VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  fare_amount DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id);

CREATE TABLE payments (payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_id INT,
  trip_id INT,
  payment_amount DECIMAL(8,2) NOT NULL,
  payment_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (passenger_id) REFERENCES passengers(passenger_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (trip_id) REFERENCES trips(trip_id);
